content.raw:
FYI, I just checked that meshes are not showing up on the camera. I can work on that in another PR, this is the world I tested:

~~~
diff -r beee640c87c1 examples/worlds/camera_sensor.sdf
--- a/examples/worlds/camera_sensor.sdf Fri Jan 04 15:07:54 2019 -0800
+++ b/examples/worlds/camera_sensor.sdf Mon Jan 07 13:43:04 2019 -0800
@@ -214,5 +214,41 @@
       </link>
     </model>
 
+    <model name="duck1">
+      <pose>-1 0 3 0.0 0.0</pose>
+      <link name="link">
+        <inertial>
+          <inertia>
+            <ixx>3.92</ixx>
+            <ixy>0</ixy>
+            <ixz>0</ixz>
+            <iyy>3.92</iyy>
+            <iyz>0</iyz>
+            <izz>3.92</izz>
+          </inertia>
+          <mass>39</mass>
+        </inertial>
+        <collision name="collision">
+          <pose>0 0 -0.4 1.57 0.0 0.0</pose>
+          <geometry>
+            <mesh>
+              <scale>0.5 0.5 0.5</scale>
+              <uri>file://test/media/duck.dae</uri>
+            </mesh>
+          </geometry>
+        </collision>
+
+        <visual name="visual">
+          <pose>0 0 -0.4 1.57 0.0 0.0</pose>
+          <geometry>
+            <mesh>
+              <scale>0.5 0.5 0.5</scale>
+              <uri>file://test/media/duck.dae</uri>
+            </mesh>
+          </geometry>
+        </visual>
+      </link>
+    </model>
+
   </world>
 </sdf>
~~~
content.html:
FYI, I just checked that meshes are not showing up on the camera. I can work on that in another PR, this is the world I tested:

diff -r beee640c87c1 examples/worlds/camera_sensor.sdf
--- a/examples/worlds/camera_sensor.sdf Fri Jan 04 15:07:54 2019 -0800
+++ b/examples/worlds/camera_sensor.sdf Mon Jan 07 13:43:04 2019 -0800
@@ -214,5 +214,41 @@
       </link>
     </model>

+    <model name="duck1">
+      <pose>-1 0 3 0.0 0.0</pose>
+      <link name="link">
+        <inertial>
+          <inertia>
+            <ixx>3.92</ixx>
+            <ixy>0</ixy>
+            <ixz>0</ixz>
+            <iyy>3.92</iyy>
+            <iyz>0</iyz>
+            <izz>3.92</izz>
+          </inertia>
+          <mass>39</mass>
+        </inertial>
+        <collision name="collision">
+          <pose>0 0 -0.4 1.57 0.0 0.0</pose>
+          <geometry>
+            <mesh>
+              <scale>0.5 0.5 0.5</scale>
+              <uri>file://test/media/duck.dae</uri>
+            </mesh>
+          </geometry>
+        </collision>
+
+        <visual name="visual">
+          <pose>0 0 -0.4 1.57 0.0 0.0</pose>
+          <geometry>
+            <mesh>
+              <scale>0.5 0.5 0.5</scale>
+              <uri>file://test/media/duck.dae</uri>
+            </mesh>
+          </geometry>
+        </visual>
+      </link>
+    </model>
+
   </world>
 </sdf>
